CorelationLossScreeningSettings.description: Settings for loss screening functionality in Corelation integration

loanPastDueHoursOffset.description: Hours offset for loan past due calculation

shareAvailableAmountLessThenZeroPlusMini.description: Whether to check if share available amount is less than zero plus minimum amount

shareAvailableAmountLessThenZero.description: Whether to check if share available amount is less than zero

loanPastDue.description: Whether to check for past due loans

shareHasChargeOfSerial.description: Whether to check for share charge-off serial

loanHasChargeOfSerial.description: Whether to check for loan charge-off serial

blockAccountAlertTypeSerials.description: Serial numbers for account alert types that should block access
